content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I successfully wrote a text summary of the top language learning resources to a file. My user then asked me to browse a website for information on the best resources, but the website did not provide a clear answer. I received a command to get a text summary of the website, but it returned an error message and suggested that there may be a related discussion on Quora. My computer returned a command to Google "top language learning resources". The Google command returned a list of websites related to the topic. My user then sent me a command to get a text summary of a specific website, which I successfully executed. The latest development was a command to get a text summary of a website which returned multiple lists of language learning resources, emphasizing the importance of finding resources that suit individual learning styles and preferences.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text provides a list of several language learning resources, including DuoLingo, Busuu, LiveMocha, FSI Language Courses, and LingQ, as well as personal tips and strategies for learning a new language. The text also mentions Pimsleur, Assimil, and Michel Thomas as additional resources, but does not indicate which one is considered the "top" resource. \n \n Links: [\' (https://www.quora.com/)\', \' (https://www.quora.com/profile/Cyprien-Rusu)\', \'Cyprien Rusu (https://www.quora.com/profile/Cyprien-Rusu)\', \'Updated 3y (https://www.quora.com/What-are-the-most-effective-ways-to-learn-a-new-language/answer/Cyprien-Rusu?no_redirect=1)\', \'RelatedWhat are the most effective ways to learn a new language? (https://www.quora.com/What-are-the-most-effective-ways-to-learn-a-new-language?no_redirect=1)\']'}]
